entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cookies are not sent in .NET MAUI Blazor with ASP.NET MVC API #16409
  • Android ListView RotationX not working in MAUI #16403
    Backlog
  • .net8 default project csproj gui throws errors #16400
  • SVG Font-family does not apply after convert to png(Splash screen) #16399
  • Extend UseSafeArea to Android (and other platforms) #16398
    Backlog
  • Checkbox Not Checked When Using Gesture Recognizer #16397
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] CollectionView Item height of 0 collapses view. #16396
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatedTo is fired when leaving a Modal page #16395
  • iOS handler doesn't intercept keyboard events on the simulator, but it works on a real iPad #16394
    Backlog
  • Adding elements through code behind doesn't work. #16393
    Backlog
  • LinearGradientBrush not working on Android in Landscape orientation #16392

Closed

  • MAUI: Could not compile native assembly file: environment.arm64-v8a.ll #14531
    Backlog
  • x:Name in any Element inside CollectionView not recognized in code-behind. #16182
  • TapGestureRecognizer on Popup on iOS (CommunityToolkit.Maui) doesn't work on .NET 8.0 #16402
  • Flyout Items not working properly #15463
  • VerticalStackLayout inside Scrollview: Button at the bottom not clickable on IOS #14257
    .NET 8 GA
  • SwipeItem.IsEnable clobbering source value when BindingContext changed #15444
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] [C] fix SelectedIndex propagation for picker #16412
  • Reinstate IContentView and ILayout methods #16411
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
  • Fix device tests to tun on arm64 #16408
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [tests] consolidate various DoesNotLeak tests #16407
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
  • [build] CI build fixes and UItests #16401
  • [C] fix SelectedIndex propagation for picker #16387
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-picker

Merged

  • [ios] fix memory leak in RefreshView #16384
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Avoid CheckBox memory leak #16376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Revert "[vs-workload][net8.0] Set EnableSideBySideManifests=true #16405
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview.6.2] Bring old tizen and iOS versions and net8 changes #16381
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16371
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #16372
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Resize internal content container when ScrollView content is resized #16385
  • [Windows] Fix SwipeView DeviceTests #16226
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview

Updated

  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Wrong scroll with shell and entry and safe area #16339
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
    area/docs 📓
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    memory-leak 💦
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue loading images from Stream #16162
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • [iOS] Re-enable editor tests #16365
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
